Just leaving something positive from someone who never plays OW1 and started only since OW2 season 4.

When you look at the game separately from all the Activision Blizzard shenanigans, it is still a pretty good game. As a matter of fact this is the only shooter I play at the moment.

No lootboxes? Don't really care to be honest, the game is free, and skins and various other items don't impact anything. You can just play the game for free without giving any money to Activision Blizzard, which I recommend doing so, the pricing of the items in the game is outrageous to say the least.

No PVE content as promised? Don't really care as I don't play OW2 for any PVE, role queue is the only thing I queue up for, but of course, breaking promises is bad and it is only right many people are disappointed.

My point is, disconnect yourself from all the news, hate post about the game on the internet, look at this game as a game by the lovely devs, not the infamous Activision Blizzard you know on the internet, then give this game a go if you have not. This is a game I regret not starting earlier, and have come to love it this late down the line, and would love to see more people feel the same way.

The dynamic, fast pace nature of the game, regardless or what role you play is simply fascinating, and I have not found another game to satisfy this itch of mine.

It is simply unfortunately that they ended up under Activision Blizzard, but I'm still grateful for the gem the devs have made, despite the situation they're forced into.

The game STOLE my money ... I paid for the Invasion bundle and I got NOTHING ...

NOT RECOMMENDED

(might change review once I get the stuff I paid for)

es ow 1 pero con skins mas caras y ahora te venden el modo pve por partes, juÃ©galo si quieres perder algo de tiempo, la verdad no es una cosa del otro mundo y no es obligatorio comprar cosmÃ©ticos como para quejarse por los precios.

The playtime you see on this review is just me standing in practice range to meet the minimum playtime requirement to review this piece of sh*t. Since 2018-2019, Overwatch has not been a great game if you want to have fun. It's a great game if you want to shoot yourself in the head. Somehow Overwatch 2 managed to make the game even worse to play. Here's why:

1. Battle pass exp given after each match is so low, it felt so painful to grind the battle pass.

2. With that low battle pass exp in mind, every new hero released in the future will be locked behind the battle pass at level 45. Good luck grinding :)  OR you can buy them instantly on the overpriced item shop or premium battle pass :)

3, Oh yeah, those new heroes have high chances of being overpowered and meta defining, so time to open up those wallets if the slow battle pass progress frustated you :)

4. With that awful battle pass progression and locked new hero, Overwatch 2 unnecessarily induces fear of missing out. Yeah, we totally love those FOMO, am i right? Who plays game for fun anyway?

5. Near the end of the season, Blizzard pretended to be generous by giving 2x battle pass exp boost.

6. The core gameplay of 5v5 is fun, i have to give them credits for that BUT the meta will always be decided by the developer because the balancing update always find a way to f*cked it all up with every update. Which make the game frustating to play after the honeymoon phase because you don't pick the "right" hero. A quickplay game will felt like competitive game sooner or later.

7. They were supposed to released the whole PVE experience but decided to separate each PVE mission which you have to pay to play. I have low self-esteem but i'm confindent that those paid PVE content is just a one and done experience with very little replayability based on my experience with Overwatch 1 and the Overwatch 2 Halloween PVE mode. I think every new PVE content will be a pay to play DLC from now on.

It's the biggest piece of dogshit. Especially compared to Overwatch ONE. Greed levels... exceeding maximum. Gotta buy them $20 skins. Gotta buy them $40 bundles. Gotta play that PvE... Oh wait they scammed everyone and cancelled that. AVOID.

ESTE JUEGO FUE UN DAWGRADE DEL ORIGINAL PARA PODER EXTRAERLE DINERO CON PASES DE BATALLA A LOS QUE TENIAMOS CAJITAS GRATIS. CON LA EXCUSA DE QUE ERA PVE PAPY JEFF SE FUE CUANDO LE DIERON EL NUEVO PLAN DE OVERWATCH 2.
VENDIERON EL JUEGO COMO PVE EN PRE COMPRA EL PVE NUNCA LLEGO HASTA QUE SALIO 1 HORA DE CONTENIDO QUE SI YA HABIAS COMPRADO LO DEMAS TAMBIEN TIENES QUE COMPRAR ALGUNOS PAGARON "OVERWATCH" 1 Y 2 COMO 3 VECES Y AUN ASI ES UN OVERWATCH 0.7 CON TODO LO QUE LE QUITARON
